message.name: WIND_SENSOR
message.description: This message encodes all of the wind sensor data from the daughter board.
message.field: The angle from the wind (in degrees).
The speed of the wind for the specified angle (in m/s).
Status of the wind sensor. 0 indicates on and 0xFF indicates off.

message.name: LIDAR
message.description: This message encodes all of the lidar data from the daughter board.
message.field: The distance measured by the Lidar (in cm).
Status of the Lidar. 0 indicates on and 0xFF indicates off.

message.name: PYRANOMETER
message.description: This message encodes all of the pyranometer data from the daughter board.
message.field: The solar iradiance measured by the Pyranometer (in W.m-2).
Status of the Pyranometer. 0 indicates on and 0xFF indicates off.
